title: Are the OLD JUDGE books still available?
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: Are the OLD JUDGE books still available?
posts.post_content:
I need to get a copy of this book... 

are they still available and if so can someone please provide purchasing instructions?

I actually bought mine off ebay, but here's the mailing address that was provided a few posts down for purchasing the book:

Send Check or Money order to:
Richard Masson
1158 26th Street #537
Santa Monica, Ca. 90403
No problem, glad to be of help!
